name: Cheoss
description:
Chess but you cannot plan your moves, because each turn ALL your figures reshuffle and occasionally die/betray you on the God's whim.

Team

Razenpok (https://twitter.com/Razenpok) - Idea, Code, Art

HolyGhost (https://vk.com/id8141570) - Music, SFX

Third-party content

We'd like to thank KissPng (www.kisspng.com) for W40k Chaos God symbols (licensed for personal usage https://www.kisspng.com/png-gods-of-the-old-world-warhammer-4-chaos-symbo-975206...)

“Impurity shall be our armour. Hate shall be our weapon. Immortality shall be our reward.” – Codex Chaos Space Marines (4th edition)
